p: Adverse events were reported in 10 study subjects (1.4%). None of the events met the criteria of seriousness. The following events occurred in more than one subject: eczema ( n = 3) and mild hyponatremia ( n = 2). The following events occurred in one subject each: self-limiting supraventricular tachycardia, intermittent self-limiting paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, mild hypokalemia, bleeding gums, common cold, dizziness, mild hypoglycemia, intermittent visual disorders, and headache. None of the subjects discontinued the fasting because of the events.
